attributes.action: Ban Huawei’s involvement in U.K. 5g network due to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Once the dust has settled from the Covid-19 outbreak and the final death toll has been taken, the U.K. should review its position regarding investment deals with China. We should also review the Chancellors plastic tax so we are encouraged to buy fewer poor quality petroleum chemical derived products from the PRC and elsewhere in the world.
attributes.background: Due to the severe economic impact on the U.K. economy we should not entertain allowing Huawei access to build our 5g network.
